org.apache.jackrabbit.core.util.db
Interface DatabaseAware

All Known Implementing Classes:
BundleDbPersistenceManager, DatabaseJournal, DB2FileSystem, DbDataStore, DbFileSystem, DerbyDataStore, DerbyFileSystem, DerbyPersistenceManager, DerbyPersistenceManager, H2PersistenceManager, JNDIDatabaseJournal, MSSqlDatabaseJournal, MSSqlFileSystem, MSSqlPersistenceManager, MSSqlPersistenceManager, MySqlPersistenceManager, Oracle9FileSystem, Oracle9PersistenceManager, OracleDatabaseJournal, OracleFileSystem, OraclePersistenceManager, OraclePersistenceManager, PostgreSQLPersistenceManager, SimpleDbPersistenceManager
public interface DatabaseAware

Bean components (i.e., classes that appear in the repository descriptor) that implement this interface will get the repositories ConnectionFactory instance injected just after construction and before initialization.

Method Summary
